# Slax Reader  

Slax Reader is a simple yet powerful web-based service and browser extension that helps users save, annotate, and process web articles for a relaxed reading and advanced knowledge management experience. It works seamlessly with Slax Reader API and Slax Reader App, providing a complete "read later" and reading workflow solution suitable for productivity enthusiasts, researchers, and everyday readers.

## How to Use

- **Web:** [Slax Reader](https://r.slax.com) — Free registration, instant use in browser.
- **Browser Extension:** [Chrome Web Store](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/slax-reader/gdnhaajlomjkhahnmiijphnodkcfikfd) — Save articles in one click.
- **Telegram Bot:** [@slaxreaderbot](https://t.me/slaxreaderbot) — Save and manage readings directly from your phone.

## Key Features

- Save articles/webpages via URL, browser extension, or Telegram
- Annotate, underline, comment, reply, share, star, and archive content
- AI-powered: automatic summarization, tag extraction, dialogue based on highlights
- Semantic and keyword search in all saved content
- Import bookmarks (e.g., from Omnivore)
- WebSocket/browser push notifications for instant updates
- Server-side rendering and fully-responsive web app
